articles.title: Omicron variant may reduce incidence of severe Covid disease - Daily Pioneer
articles.description:

articles.title: South Africa vs India: KL Rahul points fingers at misfiring middle-order after 1st ODI defeat in Paarl - India Today
articles.description: South Africa vs India, 1st ODI: Stand-in captain KL Rahul rued the lack of partnerships in the middle overs as India fell short of a 296-run target by 31 runs in the series opener in Paarl on Wednesday.
